resources.string: Waste as much of the scammers time as you can!

Scammer bingo was designed from the windows community version created by JoeTheHuman. HexxiumGamingYT, Lewis Tech and Dazzas Gone Mad have amazing videos where they talk to scammers, check them all out!
Well done, you played the scammer for a really long time! Make sure to report them!
You\'re half way there! You can rat out the scammer now if it\'s taking too long but still make sure to report them!
Are you sure you want to call this phone number?
This number is known for contacting scammers, are you sure you want to call?
Are you sure you want to open this URL?
This website is known for advertising scammers, are you sure you want to open it?
How to play Scammer bingo - Numbers
Try to get the scammer to say any of the numbers and mark them off as you go!
You need Android Marshmallow (6.0) or above to use this feature.
You need Android Lollipop (5.0) or above to use this feature.

string-array.name: periphArray
string-array.item: Do you need technical suppowt?
Press the Windows Key and the Letter R, R as in Romeo. You got that?
Your Windows dextop is wirused sir.
I see lots of malware and infections on your computer sir.
DABLU DABLU DABLU DOT SUPPOWT DOT ME SIR, 3 DABLUS NOT 4!!!
That will be a one time charge of $199.99 sir.
There are tons of junk files on this computer sir.
All these stopped services are bad sir.
Oh my gosh sir!!! All these errors and warnings are Chinese hackers sir!!!
DONTOUCHTHEKEYBOWDORMOUSESIR!!!
BRIT MONKAY…
I\'m not a scam sir.
I will show you each and everything sir.
#PRAYFORSID.

resources.string: Apply a dark theme throughout the app
Enter the text that you wish to appear on the selected button
Please select a button to change text:

string-array.name: light_status_mode_entries
string-array.item: Off, status bar icons will be white
On, status bar icons will be black
Auto, status bar icons will be black if primary color is light

string-array.name: light_toolbar_mode_entries
string-array.item: Off, toolbar text/icons will be white
On, toolbar text/icons will be black
Auto, toolbar text/icons will be black if primary color is light
